	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

::Decadel::

Decadel watched from a screen down in his lair as Maximal City=
 was struck by a massive beam.  He also recieved the transmission from the =
Infecticons.

"These bots might make a very valuable ally to me.  Although =
I am without an army, I have all the knowledge and skills that is equal to =
1,000 armies!  Indeed, I should drop the bots who fired that beam a message=
," Decadel said to himself.

Decadel pressed a few buttons and established =
communication with the bots who fired the beam and offered an alliance.

"G=
reetings," Decadel began, "I enjoyed your little demonstration of force to =
those pathetic Maximals.  And I also recieved your offering of an alliance =
to anybody.  As you may have assumed by now, I would like to accept that of=
fering, and perhaps try to form an alliance with you.  You see, I would be =
very valuable to your forces.  I am without my own faction, but I am probab=
ly one of the most powerful bots in the universe, next to Unicron.  I posse=
ss information of every faction and know this planet like the back of my ha=
nd.  Not only that, I have amazing weapons and technology in my hands.  Tog=
ether, we could rule this planet and many others with an iron fist!  As a m=
atter of fact, I have a little gadget I've developed, and I have a number o=
f them, which may recruit us more bots.  Do you accept my offer?"

Decadel =
looked at the robotic worm he had in his hand.  He once had a few slaves by=
 using them, but things had changed.  But, if he could make an alliance wit=
h the Infecticons, things would soon change....again....



~Abyssian By Bi=
rth~
~Badass By Choice~
